name: Lost in a Mine
description:
My 2021 entry for the Global Game Jam with the theme of lost and found.

As an adventurer who has become lost exploring a mine, your goal is to find a way out.

Interact with switches and breakers by pressing 'E' when you are close to them. Once the door is open, interact with it to find your way out.

A/D or arrow keys to move and space to jump.
